title: Stainless Steel Appliances, Short-Term Lease Available, Linen Closets
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "Conveniently located in Westminster, Colorado, halfway between Denver's central business district and Boulder County and ensconced against breathtaking and idyllic mountain scenery, Westcliff Apartments will not disappoint!", "Featuring one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with stainless steel appliances, upgraded kitchens and the largest square footage in the area, Westcliff is Westminster's premiere apartment community.", 'Call or visit us today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Gazebo with a Fire Pit & Gas Grill', 'Full-size Washer and Dryer Included', 'Crown Molding Accented with Two-tone Paint', 'Library & Reading Lounge', 'Pet-friendly community with fenced in dog park', 'Brand New Hardwood Floors', 'Expansive mountain views', 'Game Room', 'Fireplaces in 2nd and 3rd story homes', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Vaulted Ceilings on Upper Floors', 'Attached and Detached Garages Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
